title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link. When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed but the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page. It would be helpful to have the clicked link selected to provide more context to the user on their return to the welcome page.
OB: Open the application with build 20021001. Verify that when you restart the application, you get a welcome page. Ensure that the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata is removed. Click on any link in the welcome page.
EB: After clicking on a link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed, but the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
SR: It would be beneficial if links were selected when clicked on in order to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page.
